1.Text:
Seriously! Cid disappeared again without saying
a word...!

He promised we'd return home together during our
next vacation... Honestly, this is unforgivable―
Ack...!

...It's happening again. Lately, my left hand has
been aching...

At this rate, I might make Cid worry. Worse, I could
hurt him...

*sigh* Does this mean I should avoid Cid until I
understand what's going on with my hand?
...No, Cid needs me! Avoiding him isn't an option!

That's why there's no issue with me looking into
where my brother went! And checking on the
girls who get close to him―
...Wait, what's this?
A black...mask?

Thank you for the report. We'll keep an eye on the
situation in Oriana for now. More importantly―
Right, regarding Master Shadow's whereabouts.

It's been several days since he was swallowed into
the "Black Rose"... If he never returns―
No, he will definitely return.

Shadow has always exceeded our expectations.
This time will be no different.
...We know that better than anyone, right?
Lady Alpha...
Yes, I apologize for my careless words.

So long as we're allocating personnel towards
searching for him, the rest of us will need to
work harder than usual. Let's do what we can
for now.
Yes, ma'am.
What we can do for now... Understood.

Our task at hand is eliminating the remnants of the
Cult hiding in Oriana. The ringleader is a man named
Maximilian...but he's quite cautious, rarely appearing
in public.

Oriana remains in danger so long as we don't defeat
him... If only we could somehow make contact.
I have some intel regarding that matter.
Please share it.

There is an upcoming masquerade ball at the mansion
of an aristocrat affiliated with the Cult. No. 666,
you're familiar with the event, aren't you?
Y-Yes...but I didn't know the Cult was involved...

Just goes to show how deeply rooted the Cult is all
across the world... Continue, Nu.

There's a possibility that Maximilian himself will
show up at this masquerade ball... At least that's
what I've heard.

No doubt it's some kind of trap, but we can't miss
this opportunity.

Indeed, who knows when we'll have another chance...
Nu, can I leave this matter to you?
Very well. I'll begin preparations.
O-Oh...! May I add something?
What is it?

Instead of an invitation, this party requires
certain masks.

They come in pairs and are meaningless without a
complete set.

Furthermore, these masks are distributed only to a
limited number of aristocrats in Oriana. I have one,
but...
...Is there something you're struggling to say?

(There's no way I can say...that I gave the other
mask to Cid...)

(If I were to tell the truth, that would involve him
in all this... I absolutely can't let that happen...!)

No, my apologies. You see, I've misplaced the other
mask...

...I understand. The timing has been quite hectic,
so it's understandable.

No. 666, you can leave now. Hand over the mask you
have to Nu.
Understood!

Heheh... Lambda never taught her how to lie,
it seems.

The other mask is with Cid. Retrieve it from his
dorm.

So, her story about the misplaced mask was a lie.
Are you okay with that, Lady Alpha?

Yes. She's just trying to protect Cid in her own
way.
If you say so, Lady Alpha...

While you're at it, keep an eye on Claire's
movements as well.

No―more precisely, I should say Claire and her
"alter ego."
Understood.

I'll also be cautious of Aurora the Calamity Witch
that lurks within Lady Claire...

2.Text:
(First, I'll need to retrieve the mask. Cid's room
should be around here―)
(...Someone's coming out? It's―)

This was the only thing I ended up finding...
What is this mask anyway?
(Lady Claire?! And she's holding the mask...!)
(...Let's follow her for a bit.)
...Nothing in this book, either...

(There's nothing about this mask in Midgar's art or
history...)

(Could it be from another country...? Hold on,
why would Cid even have this?!)

*sigh* This would be so much easier if I could just
ask him directly...
Excuse me. Could I have a moment, please?
...Who are you? Sorry but I'm busy right now.

My apologies. I work on the library committee.
I'm sorry for disturbing you.
But I'm just so happy to finally find that mask―

You know about this mask? Then, do you also know
about Cid...?!

Tell me! Where is Cid right now, and what is he up
to?!

I'm afraid I don't know anything about that. I only
know about that mask.
I-I see...

In that case, what is this mask? I couldn't find
anything about it in my research.

It's a unique item distributed only to a limited
number of aristocrats in Oriana. It doubles as
an invitation to a ball.

So, my brother was invited to a ball? Who would
invite him...?!

Wait, are you saying you took your brother's mask
without permission?

What choice did I have? I thought it would provide a
valuable clue to finding my missing brother.
But now I'm sure. He must be in Oriana Kingdom―
Urgh...! Not again...
Are you okay?

Just an ache in my left hand... Honestly, what even
is this...?

(Lady Claire doesn't yet realize what the mark carved
on her left hand is―)

(...Could this be a ploy to make her aware of the
demon Diablos?!)
So that's what it was...
Huh?

No, it's nothing. About what I mentioned earlier...
It would be futile to go to Oriana on your own.

What do you mean? How could I not go if Cid might be
be there? I don't have any other choice!

That mask is part of a pair. Going alone would mean
you'd be turned away at the door.
As for the other half of the pair...it's right here.

...What are you suggesting by showing me that?
Do you want me to hand over my mask?
No, not at all. I'd like you to join me at the ball.

I'm sure it would be an excellent opportunity to
learn various things about your brother and more...

(Sounds shady... But since she has a similar mask,
it's probably not entirely false...)

(...No, there's no time to hesitate! If Cid was
invited to the ball, someone there must know
about him!)
Alright, let's work together.

Thank you. With my connections, we can safely enter
Oriana. And don't worry about the return trip.
We'll depart in two days. See you then, Claire.
Huh? How do you know my name―
...And she's gone already. Who even was that woman?

(Since she has a mask that pairs with Cid's,
there might be some connection, but...)

(What is their relationship? And why did Cid have
this mask in the first place?)
*sigh* All this thinking is giving me a headache...

3.Text:
Two days after their meeting, the pair depart the
capital and successfully enter Oriana Kingdom.
They infiltrate the masquerade ball―

So, everyone really is wearing masks. It's sort of
in poor taste...

It's the sort of place where aristocrats come to
enjoy a little thrill with each other. I can see why
you'd find it in poor taste.

I guess bored aristocrats need these kinds of
diversions.

...Seems you don't like these kinds of gatherings
either.

I used to be sent to events like this often.
Maybe I'm just tired of them.
I see, so you've had your fill of them.

By the way, why are swords allowed at a ball?
Normally, they're not allowed at parties.

I suppose it's because this isn't an ordinary party.
I'm still not exactly sure what's going on.
That doesn't sit right with me...

(Well, it's probably a ploy to wipe out the remnants
of the Perv faction... It's actually quite obvious.)

Anyway, we should focus on gathering information
about your brother... That being said, it seems
something has already started.
What's started?

It's dance time. We should dance with some random
men to avoid suspicion―
Absolutely not.
...If we don't, it will make us stand out.

I don't care! Dancing with any man other than Cid is
out of the question!

Oh dear, well, that's a problem... That leaves us
with no choice.

In that case, let's dance together. Come on, give me
your hand.
What?! W-Wait a minute...!
Follow my lead... That's right, you're doing well.
...I can do this much, of course.

Are you still upset with me? I was trying to be
considerate in my own way.

Well, it's better than dancing with some strange
man, but...
I just don't like how you anticipate my thoughts.

Thank you for your honesty. You know, I'm actually
starting to enjoy this.

Oh? Maybe you should also try being honest.
You don't seem to be having fun at all.

Is that how it looks to you? I thought I was
enjoying myself behind this mask.
Not that I care. I can't see you anyway.
Guess not. ...Anyway, that's one song done.
*sigh* It's finally over. Seriously, what a hassle―

...Is that woman staring at us? Were we dancing that
strangely?
I don't think so, but...it's a little concerning.

Maybe she knows something about Cid...?!
I'll go gather some information!
...And she's gone.
Excuse me. You were looking at us just now―
Eeeeek!
Huh? Wh-What's the matter?!

Y-You're the Owl...aren't you? Don't kill me...
please!

Oh, come on... I'm not going to do anything!
I just want to talk...!

Anyway, come over here! You don't want to attract
attention either, do you?!
...Looks like you've calmed down.

Y-Yes... I panicked because your mask matched the
description of the Owl.

The Owl... You mentioned that name earlier.
What does it mean?

...You really don't know? The Owl is a masked spy
getting a lot of buzz lately.

There was a rumor the Owl might infiltrate the ball
today. I was so frightened...
I see... So the Owl is that frightening.
O-Of course! After all, the Owl's true identity...
...is rumored to be...that Shadow!
...What?

(Even I know that name. Shadow is the one causing a
stir everywhere... No, that's not the issue!)

(Let's say the Owl is Shadow, and the mask was
originally his...)
(Why was it in Cid's room...?)

...No, that's impossible. Cid must've gotten
involved in all this by accident. He can be
a bit absent-minded...
There's just no way...
You're his...
His what? Who're you talking about?!
Shadow...
Cid, do you know...about Shadow?

He was impressive at the Bushin Festival, wasn't he?
What about him?

(No... It's impossible! Completely, utterly
impossible!)
(But if it's true... If Cid is Shadow...)
(...Then everything makes sense...)
A-Are you okay...? You look pale...
...Yes, I'm fine. Sorry for bothering you. Goodbye.

(I have to find out more about the mask from that
woman...)
...By the way, where did she go...?

4.Text:
While Claire was talking to the aristocrat, Nu had
left the venue and was investigating the mansion...
This is the last room. It must be around here...

Just as I expected, a hidden bookshelf. Let's see if
it contains the relevant documents―
Don't move!
*gasp*
...You're back sooner than I expected.

Seriously? That's how you're gonna play off this
situation? ...Anyway, answer me this.
Do you know about the Owl?

You suddenly point your sword at me, and now you
want to talk about some bird?
Don't play dumb!

...If you mean anything other than the bird, I don't
know what you're talking about.

Are you actually Shadow? Did you leave the mask in
Cid's room?
No, I'm not and did not.

...But even if I say that, I doubt you believe me.
Will this convince you?
You sure it's wise to lower that weapon of yours?
It's fine. Otherwise, you won't listen to me.

*sigh* Yes, you're right. In that case, I'll sheathe
my sword as well.

Thank you. I prefer to avoid any conflict with you,
if possible.
Just to be clear, I still don't trust you.

(She's likely not lying. If so, is the true identity
of Shadow...Cid?)

So, what are you doing here? Was the ball not to
your taste?
No. I came here to investigate the demon Diablos.
...Are you researching fairy tales or something?

It's not surprising you think that. But this matter
also concerns you.
Sorry, but I have no idea what you're talking about.
...Even after seeing this?
What are you on about now―
...Huh? That book...

(The pattern on the cover... Is it the same as the
one on my left hand...?!)
Wait, is it on all these books...?

Yes. Most likely, this study was created by those
who worship the demon Diablos to hide materials
and plot his resurrection.
Resurrection of the demon, for what purpose...?

Let me explain to you what I know about the demon
Diablos...

5.Text:
How much do you know about the demon Diablos and the
great hero Olivier?

How much do I know...? Isn't that just a fairy tale
everyone in Midgar knows about?
What if I told you it's a hidden historical fact?

Wait a minute. You're saying Diablos actually
existed?!

I know it's hard to believe, but it's true. This
book's emblem is also related to Diablos.
(Then, the mark on my left hand...)
Wasn't the demon Diablos harmful to humans?
So why would anyone try to resurrect him?

Unfortunately, some fools are drawn to immense
power. Not that I even want to understand them.

...If it were the old me, I would have laughed off
the demon's resurrection...
Aurora... Does this have anything to do with you?

...Speak up, answer me. What's your connection to
Diablos?

(Is Claire communicating with Aurora...? Well,
Aurora seems asleep right now anyway.)
Hey, excuse me.
Hey, library lady! Why are you ignoring me?!

Huh? Were you talking to me? Sorry, I just
thought...
...Just thought what?

You're that sort of awkward age where you talk to
yourself.
Wha—?!

(These words are effective with Lady Claire...
Master Shadow also mentioned this before.)

Wh-What the hell?! Quit acting all grown-up!
If you're curious, just say you are!
Hold on, do you want me to ask?
I-I don't... I can't involve unrelated people.
Is that so? Well, that's a shame.
You do want me to ask, don't you?

I-It's not like that! Ah, enough! This topic is
over!

Anyway, tell me more. Who's trying to resurrect the
demon Diablos―
Eeeeeeek!!!
Screaming...?!

Sounds like something's happened at the venue.
You should stay here.
W-Wait a minute!

H-How much should I pay...? How about a million...
no, 2 million zeni? Please, just spare my life―
Agh... Ngh...?!

This is a purge. I have plenty of time to kill each
one of you slowly.

Ack... The smell of blood... What the hell is going
on?!
I didn't expect them to move so quickly...

Ah, you're here. Perfect timing. I was planning on
saving you two for last.
How distasteful... Who are you anyway?

I'm Maximilian the Ruthless. There's no point in
remembering my name. You'll all die here.

6.Text:
That said, to think it would go this smoothly...
Heheh.
...So this masquerade ball was a trap after all.
A trap? What do you mean?

This is a purge. This ball was merely an excuse to
gather the remnants of the Perv faction in one
place.

I mean, what's the point of a frivolous masquerade
ball in this crumbling Oriana?

Did you also start the rumors about the Owl and
Shadow?

Mentioning that name was enough to flush out the
remnants of the Perv faction.

The Owl is a fictitious entity I created using Rose
Oriana's lost mask. Heheh... Quite effective, wasn't
it?

We'll see about that. Did you think you could use
the Shadow Garden's name and not expect the real
thing not to show up?

It makes no difference, even if a spy from the
Shadow Garden infiltrated this event. I'll just
kill everyone who showed up here!

With Mordred and Perv gone, the Shadow Garden is
nothing more than a pawn to me now!
A pawn... Such misplaced hubris.

It's not hubris when it's a fact. Once the purge is
complete, I'll head to Vegalta. My subordinates will
quickly...clean up the rest.
I'm done listening... Who even are you people?!

There's no need for you to know. You'll soon be dead
anyway.
Huh? As if I'd die that easily!

You—library lady—you know who these people are,
don't you?

They are those plotting the resurrection of the
demon Diablos—members of the Cult of Diablos.
These are the people you were talking about...!

...It looks like we're out of time to chat.
Please step back.
You've got to be kidding. I'm fighting too!

(The demon Diablos, and a cult plotting its
resurrection... The more I hear, the less I
understand.)

(But one thing is clear... This woman is definitely
a member of the Shadow Garden.)
(And Cid is―)
Lost in thought before your death? How leisurely!
Here he comes!
Not bad...!

You're a talkative one. As for your abilities...
I won't be requiring the use of my hidden
technique.
Try to withstand this! If you can, that is!
...Don't underestimate me!
Oh? You're stronger than I expected.
Now it's my turn to attack! Haaahh!

Heheh... I see, your bark matches your bite, but...
you've only managed to strike my afterimage.
Wha—?!
Time to say goodnight!
Nghh...uh...
Lady Claire!
...Well then, you're up next.
Very well... What kind of death do you prefer?

(Protect Claire while defeating this man... I didn't
expect the mission to be this challenging―)
Heheh... Mind if I join in?
Huh...?

What, still conscious? If you'd stayed passed out,
you could've died painlessly.
I like watching, but I don't like being left out.

What the hell is that weapon...? A spear made of
blood...?!
(Lady Claire... No, that power belongs to...)
(Aurora the Calamity Witch...!)
Well then, shall we continue? If you look away...
Guargh...?!
...It'll be over in an instant.

(I couldn't even see the attack...! So, this is
Aurora's power...)

Ridiculous... There can't be an attack faster than
my sword!
It's pointless. You can't see my attacks coming.

Ugh...agh... Impossible... There's no way I can
lose!
He's...trying to Awaken.

Heheheh... Hyahahah! No one can stop me now!
You're all finished!
It seems I have one more job to do.
I'll assist you.

Alright, let's dance together. But...be careful not
to end up as collateral, okay?

7.Text:
Ughhh...! H-How... How can this be happening...?
Noooooo!
Oh, is that all you've got? Pathetic.

Well, you entertained me for a bit... Now, it's time
to end this.
The blood... It's gathering...?

A gift for you. You will die by the blood of those
you killed.
S-Stop... I'm not done yet... A-Aaaaaaghhh!

...Not quite as elegant as Shadow would have done
it.
What truly terrifying power...

Are you okay? This building seems like it's about to
collapse.
Yes, let's get out of here.
Oh, about that...

I'm reaching my limit, so I'll leave the rest to
you.
R-Right...
Ngh... Ughh...?
Are you awake?
Oww... Is this...the Academy...?

Are you okay? It seems you hit your head,
so go easy.

...What's going on? What happened to the ball...
and Maximilian...?!
You must have been dreaming.

Dreaming...? Oh, right. That explains how
unrealistic it all was... It makes sense now―
...Wait, it totally doesn't! I'm not that gullible!

*sigh* ...I guess that would've been asking for too
much.
What're you sighing about?

You must've imagined it. Now that you're feeling better,
I'll be going...

You're not going anywhere! I won't ask who you are
or about the Cult, but...

Just answer this! Ultimately, what was the mask that
my brother...that Cid had?
It originally belonged to Rose Oriana.

During her stay in Midgar, she gifted it to Cid
Kagenou, inviting him to the masquerade ball
with the pair of masks.
...That's it?
What else did you think it was?

Umm... I thought maybe it was something Cid came up
with to hide his identity...
Are you still half asleep?
(Really...just a gift from Princess Rose to Cid...?)
*sigh* How misleading! Seriously!

(Still, at least it puts my mind at ease. I knew it.
There's no way Cid could be Shadow.)

...But that's odd. If the mask belonged to Princess
Rose, why did you have the other one?
...And she's gone...
...The Shadow Garden. Who are they, really?

Looks like I was totally used during this whole
incident. Well, at least I learned about Diablos.

I can't even remember how I got here after passing
out... Aurora, do you know anything?

...Hey, you could at least give some kind of answer.
All you do is make my left hand ache...
Huh? The ache... Has it stopped?

Anyway, more importantly...Cid! I wasn't able to get
any information on him this time... Maybe I should
interrogate those two who are always hanging around
him. What you seek is often right under your nose!

Once I find Cid...maybe I should put a leash on him
so he won't wander off again. Seriously...

With that thought, Claire sets off again in search
of Cid...
